snippet.title: Little Friends Puppy Island - Official Demo Trailer | Wholesome Direct 2023
snippet.description:
Take a tour of Puppy Island, and see various activities you can engage in like playing with puppies, dressing them up, hunting for treasure, and more, in this latest trailer for Little Friends Puppy Island. Little Friends Puppy Island will be available on Steam and Nintendo Switch on June 27, 2023, and a demo for the game is available now on Steam.

#SummerOfGaming
